alert.note: Alert for Tallahatchie; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 10:55AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Yalobusha and eastern Tallahatchie Counties through 1130 AM CST... At 1055 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Paynes, or 14 miles south of Charleston, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, George Payne State Park, Coffeeville, Enid, Paynes, Scobey, Oakland, Glendora, Bryant, Distall, Cascilla, Tippo, Tillatoba, Leverett, Effie and Rosebloom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
